item.title: MSc Thesis: Transformer-based Optical Flow Estimation in General Computer Vision
item.description: Description Deep learning has reached a new era in 2021, with Transformer-based networks making a name for themselves in Computer vision tasks, topping the Leaderboard in Recognition, Detection and Segmentation [1-3].
